title: Moldable compositions and methods of using the same

events.title: Assigned to CRAYOLA LLC
description: ASSIGNMENT OF ASSIGNORS INTEREST (SEE DOCUMENT FOR DETAILS).
Assignors: NGUYEN, CINDY, FITZPATRICK, JAMES BROE, MOSKAL, MICHAEL G., ROWAN, DAVID, SPERA, MICHAEL L.

classifications.description: Starch; Degradation products thereof, e.g. dextrin
Polyvinyl alcohol; Partially hydrolysed homopolymers or copolymers of esters of unsaturated alcohols with saturated carboxylic acids

abstract: The present invention provides moldable compositions that are capable of drying and hardening if left in open air at room temperature for a period of time. Embodiments of the moldable compositions comprise water, at least one polar polymeric resin (e.g., polyvinyl alcohol), at least one thickening agent (e.g., boric acid, borate salt, or hydrate of a borate salt), at least one humectant (e.g., glycerin, propylene glycol, etc.), at least one filler (e.g., corn starch, tapioca, or arrowroot), optionally at least one releasing agent (e.g., mineral oil) and optionally at least one additive.
claims: 1. A moldable composition comprising water, at least one polar polymeric resin, at least one thickening agent, at least one humectant, at least one filler, optionally at least one releasing agent and optionally at least one additive.
2. The moldable composition of claim 1, wherein the at least one polar polymeric resin comprises polyvinyl alcohol.
3. The moldable composition of claim 1, wherein the at least one thickening agent comprises boric acid, a borate salt, or a hydrate of a borate salt.
4. The moldable composition of claim 1, wherein the at least one humectant comprises glycerin and polyethylene glycol.
5. The moldable composition of any of claim 1, wherein the at least one filler comprises corn starch.
6. The moldable composition of claim 1, wherein the at least one releasing agent comprises mineral oil.

7. The moldable composition of claim 1, wherein the moldable composition comprises at least one additive selected from the group consisting of pH adjusters, defoamers, dispersants, preservatives, colorants and scents.

8. The moldable composition of claim 1 comprising between about 15 wt % to about 60 wt % water, between about 1 wt % to about 20 wt % humectant, between about 0.1 wt % to about 10 wt % polyvinyl alcohol, between about 0.01 wt % to about 5 wt % thickening agent(s), between about 20 wt % to about 75 wt % filler(s), optionally between about 0.1 wt % to about 10 wt % releasing agent(s), and optionally between about 0.1 wt % to about 5 wt % additives.

9. The moldable composition of claim 1 comprising between about 20 wt % to about 35 wt % water, between about 1 wt % to about 15 wt % humectant, between about 1 wt % to about 6 wt % polyvinyl alcohol, between about 0.1 wt % to about 3 wt % thickening agent(s), between about 35 wt % to about 65 wt % filler(s), optionally between about 1 wt % to about 6 wt % releasing agent(s), and optionally between about 0.1 wt % to about 3 wt % additives.

10. The moldable composition of claim 1, wherein the at least one thickening agent comprises a borate salt or a hydrate of a borate salt selected from the group consisting of ammonium borate, zinc borate, sodium borate and ammonium pentaborate tetrahydrate.
11. The moldable composition of claim 10, wherein the at least one thickening agent further comprises guar gum and xanthan gum.

12. The moldable composition of claim 1, wherein the moldable composition comprises water; glycerin; polyvinyl alcohol; propylene glycol; at least one filler selected from the group consisting of corn starch, tapioca, arrowroot, clay and a combination thereof; mineral oil; at least one boric compound and at least one additive selected from the group consisting of pH adjusters, defoamers, dispersants, preservatives, colorants and scents.
13. The moldable composition of claim 1, wherein the at least one thickening agent includes guar gum and xanthan gum.
14. The moldable composition of claim 1, wherein the at least one filler comprises at least one of arrowroot or tapioca.

15. The moldable composition of claim 1, wherein the moldable composition comprises water; glycerin; polyvinyl alcohol; propylene glycol; at least one filler selected from the group consisting of corn starch, tapioca, arrowroot, clay or any combination thereof; mineral oil; at least one thickening agent comprising at least one boric compound; and at least one additive selected from the group consisting of pH adjusters, defoamers, dispersants, preservatives, colorants and scents.

16. The moldable composition of claim 15, the at least one thickening agent further comprising guar gum and xanthan gum, and wherein the at least one boric compound is ammonium pentaborate tetrahydrate.

17. A method of making the moldable composition of claim 1 comprising mixing the water, at least one polar polymeric resin, at least one thickening agent, at least one humectant, at least one filler, at least one releasing agent and at least one additive together.
18. A method of using the moldable composition of claim 1 comprising molding the moldable composition into a desired shape.
19. The method of using the moldable composition of claim 13 further comprising drying the moldable composition to form a hardened composition.
20. The method of using the moldable composition of claim 14 further comprising adding a decorative agent to the hardened composition.
